bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency.

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

model.description: Model of the custom field you want to create
Model of the custom field you want to update

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The company/agency id on which you want to perform the search

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The value by which the results should be skipped. Default will be 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The value by which the results should be limited. Default will be 10

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results should be returned - Allowed values asc, desc. Default will be asc

get.description: Get details of a Sub-Account (Formerly Location) by passing the sub-account id

put.description: Update a Sub-Account (Formerly Location) based on the data provided

delete.description: Delete a Sub-Account (Formerly Location) from the Agency

parameters.name: deleteTwilioAccount
parameters.description: Boolean value to indicate whether to delete Twilio Account or not

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model of the custom field you want to retrieve

post.description:
Create a new Sub-Account (Formerly Location) based on the data provided

! This feature is only available on Agency Pro ($497) plan.
